scenario.title: Check that solution returns the correct coeffient for a valid input of dishes

examples.step: Given a collection representing the linking value of each dish '<list>'
When evaluate the coeffient of this collection
Then the coeffient should be equals to '<coeffient>'
Given a collection representing the linking value of each dish '[-1,3,4]'
When evaluate the coeffient of this collection
Then the coeffient should be equals to '17'
